questions.question: If 2x + 5 = 17, what is the value of x?
What is the area of a rectangle with length 8 cm and width 6 cm?
questions.explanation: Area of rectangle = length × width = 8 × 6 = 48 cm²

questions.question: What is 15% of 200?
Which of the following is a prime number?
questions.explanation: 29 is a prime number as it is only divisible by 1 and itself. 21=3×7, 27=3×9, 33=3×11

questions.question: What is 3/4 + 1/2?
questions.explanation: 3/4 + 1/2 = 3/4 + 2/4 = 5/4 (Converting 1/2 to 2/4 to have common denominator)

questions.question: If x² - 5x + 6 = 0, what are the values of x?
questions.explanation: Factoring: x² - 5x + 6 = (x-2)(x-3) = 0, so x = 2 or x = 3

questions.question: What is the circumference of a circle with radius 7 cm? (Use π = 22/7)
questions.explanation: Circumference = 2πr = 2 × (22/7) × 7 = 2 × 22 = 44 cm

questions.question: Find the mean of the numbers: 12, 15, 18, 20, 25
questions.explanation: Mean = Sum of all numbers ÷ Total count = (12+15+18+20+25) ÷ 5 = 90 ÷ 5 = 18

questions.question: What is the value of sin 30°?
questions.explanation: sin 30° = 1/2 is a standard trigonometric value

questions.question: What is the distance between points (3, 4) and (7, 1)?
What is the probability of getting a sum of 8 when rolling two dice?
questions.explanation: Favorable outcomes: (2,6), (3,5), (4,4), (5,3), (6,2) = 5 outcomes. Total outcomes = 36. Probability = 5/36

questions.question: What is the value of log₂ 8?
questions.explanation: log₂ 8 = 3 because 2³ = 8

questions.question: What is the derivative of x³ + 2x² - 5x + 1?
What is (3 + 4i)(2 - i)?
What is the determinant of the matrix [[2, 3], [1, 4]]?
questions.explanation: For a 2×2 matrix [[a,b],[c,d]], determinant = ad - bc = (2×4) - (3×1) = 8 - 3 = 5

questions.question: Find the sum of the first 10 terms of the arithmetic series: 3, 7, 11, 15, ...
questions.explanation: First term a = 3, common difference d = 4. Sum = n/2[2a + (n-1)d] = 10/2[6 + 9×4] = 5[6 + 36] = 5×42 = 210

questions.question: What is ∫(2x + 3)dx?
questions.explanation: ∫(2x + 3)dx = ∫2x dx + ∫3 dx = x² + 3x + C

questions.question: What is the general solution of dy/dx = 2y?
questions.explanation: This is separable: dy/y = 2dx. Integrating: ln|y| = 2x + C₁, so y = Ce²ˣ where C = e^(C₁)

questions.question: If A = (2, 3, 1) and B = (1, -2, 4), what is A × B (cross product)?
If f(x) = x³ - 6x² + 11x - 6, find f(2)
questions.explanation: f(2) = 2³ - 6(2²) + 11(2) - 6 = 8 - 24 + 22 - 6 = 0. This means x = 2 is a root of the polynomial.

questions.question: What is the largest number that divides 70 and 125, leaving remainders 1 and 8, respectively?
questions.explanation: The number must divide (70-1) and (125-8). So we need to find the HCF of 69 and 117. Factors of 69 are 1, 3, 23, 69. Factors of 117 are 1, 3, 9, 13, 39, 117. The highest common factor is 13.

questions.question: Find the value of 0.35 + 0.23 + 0.42
